reviewsJson.markdown:
**RDA**/ Velocity

 **% Used**/ 2 

**Coil**/ Clapton   **W**/ 45 

**Steep Time**/3 weeks **Wicking**/ Full 

**Mouth Feel** - Light on the palate and heavy on the nose. Moderately dense I would give it a 4 out of 10, whit a very slight throat hit.         

**Flavor Properties**- Light and smooth milk chocolate with just a hint of bitterness. Slightly buttery and semi-sweet.      

**Relatable Flavors** - like eating a handful of semi sweet milk chocolate chips.    
               
**Off Flavors** - The usual chalky              chocolate flavor, buy with no a lingering aftertaste like most.

**Position In The Recipe** - Should be a great top note. May also work as an accent for other chocolates.

**Pairings** - Other chocolates, creams, bakeries, dark berry flavors such as strawberry, caramels, and tobacco's.
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Milk Chocolate
